name: merezhyvo
description: Minimal Chromium-based browser for Ubuntu Touch built with Electron and React.
author: Naz.R

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:renderer
scripts.start:wayland: npm run build && OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=14 electron electron/main.js --fullscreen
scripts.start:mobile: npm run build && MZV_MODE=mobile OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=24 electron electron/main.js
scripts.start:desktop: npm run build && MZV_MODE=desktop electron electron/main.js
scripts.start:devtools: npm run build && MZV_MODE=desktop electron electron/main.js --devtools
scripts.start:spa: npm run build && MZV_MODE=desktop electron electron/main.js --devtools --single youtube.com
scripts.start:mob-devtools: npm run build && MZV_MODE=mobile OZONE_PLATFORM=wayland XCURSOR_SIZE=24 electron electron/main.js --devtools
scripts.start:nogpu: npm run build && MZV_DEV_NO_GPU=1 electron electron/main.js
scripts.start:h264: npm run build && MZV_FORCE_H264=1 electron electron/main.js
scripts.package:electron: npm run build && npx electron-packager . merezhyvo --platform=linux --arch=arm64 --out=app-bin --overwrite --asar --icon=merezhyvo_256.png
scripts.package: npm run package:electron && npm run stage
scripts.click:build: clickable clean || true && clickable build --arch arm64 --accept-review-errors
scripts.click:make: npm run package && npm run click:build
scripts.click:install: adb push build/*.click /home/phablet/Downloads/ && adb shell 'click install --allow-untrusted /home/phablet/Downloads/*.click'
